user.title: Set up Tibber Data
user.description:
To connect Tibber Data, you need to set up OAuth2 application credentials first.

1. Go to [Tibber Developer Console]({docs_url})
2. Contact Tibber support to register your OAuth2 client
3. Add the application credentials in Home Assistant Settings > Devices & Services > Add Integration > Application Credentials
4. Return here to complete setup

For detailed instructions, see: {setup_url}

application_credentials.description:
Follow these steps to create OAuth2 credentials for Tibber Data:

1. Go to [Tibber Developer Console]({oauth_consent_url})
2. Contact Tibber support via chat or email to register your OAuth2 client application
3. Provide them with:
   - Application name (e.g., 'Home Assistant Integration')
   - Redirect URI: `{redirect_uri}`
   - Required scopes: USER, HOME
4. Save the Client ID they provide (no client secret needed)

For more information, see the [Tibber Data API documentation]({more_info_url}).
